name: Weka
description: Weka includes tools for data preparation, classification, regression, clustering, and other machine learning algorithms used for data mining.

name: Shogun
description: Shogun is a machine learning toolbox that supports the implementation of standard machine learning algorithms.

name: OpenCV
description: OpenCV is a computer vision and machine learning library that provides common infrastructure to accelerate machine perception.

name: Torch
description: Torch is a scientific computing framework that supports machine learning algorithms on GPUs.
creators: Ronan Collobert, Samy Bengio, Johnny Mariéthoz

name: Dlib
description: Dlib is a toolkit that contains machine learning algorithms and resources for creating complex applications.

name: FANN
description: Fast Artificial Neural Network (FANN) is a library that supports the implementation of multilayer artificial neural networks.

name: OpenNN
description: OpenNN is a library that implements neural networks and is optimized for high-performance predictive analytics.

name: Tesseract OCR
description: Tesseract OCR is an optical character recognition (OCR) engine.
creators: Hewlett-Packard, University of Nevada - Las Vegas, Google

name: scikit-learn
description: scikit-learn is a Python module for machine learning built on top of SciPy.

name: Theano
description: Theano lets you define, optimize, and evaluate mathematical expressions with multi-dimensional arrays.

name: mlpack
description: mlpack aims to provide fast, extensible implementations of cutting-edge machine learning algorithms.

name: Apache Mahout
description: Apache Mahout produces free implementations of distributed and scalable machine learning algorithms.

name: H20.ai
description: H2O.ai offers a suite of open source AI projects for machine learning, large language models (LLM) fine-tuning and web app development.

name: Caffe (Convolutional Architecture for Fast Feature Embedding)
description: Caffe provides a deep learning framework designed with expression, speed, and modularity.

name: Keras
description: Keras offers consistent and simple APIs to reduce cognitive.

name: Chainer
description: Chainer is a deep learning framework that supported the building and training of neural networks.

name: TensorFlow
description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end platform that provides a flexible ecosystem of tools for machine learning.

name: fastText
description: fastText is a library that supports learning word representations and sentence classification.

name: OpenAI
description: OpenAI develops and provides access to a series of libraries and resources for AI-based applications.
creators: Sam Altman, Elon Musk, Greg Brockman, Ilya Sutskever, John Schulman,  Wojciech Zaremba

name: Apache MXNet
description: Apache MXNet is a deep learning framework for combining symbolic and imperative programming.

name: Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit
description: The Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit described neural networks series of computational steps through a directed graph and allowed users to combine common model types.

name: Mycroft
description: Mycroft is an open source voice assistant.

name: PyTorch
description: PyTorch is a machine learning framework for applications including computer vision and natural language processing.

name: Rasa
description: Rasa provides machine learning tools for developers to build, improve, and deploy text-and voice-based chatbots and assistants.

name: Hugging Face
description: Hugging Face provides open source tools that allow users to integrate AI into their products and workflows.
creators: Clément Delangue, Julien Chaumond, Thomas Wolf

name: Ray
description: Ray provides a universal API for building distributed applications.

name: Transformers
description: Transformers provides tools and resource for training pretrained models.
creators: Jason (Jinquan) Dai, Yiheng Wang, Xin Qiu, Ding Ding, Yao Zhang,  Yanzhang Wang, Xianyan Jia, Li (Cherry) Zhang, Yan Wan, Zhichao Li, Jiao Wang, Shengsheng Huang, Zhongyuan Wu, Yang Wang,  Yuhao Yang, Bowen She, Dongjie Shi, Qi Lu, Kai Huang, and Guoqiong Song.

name: JAX
description: JAX is a machine learning framework that combines Autograd and XLA to support transforming numerical functions.

name: PyCaret
description: PyCaret is a machine learning library that supports automating machine learning workflows.

name: DeepSpeed
description: DeepSpeed is a deep learning optimization library that supports deep learning training and inference.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Stable Diffusion is a deep learning project that supports detailed text-to-image generation.

name: Open Assistant
description: OpenAssistant is a chat-based assistant and also supports the creation of chat-enabled generative pre-trained transformers.
creators: Andreas Köpf, Yannic Kilcher, Huu Nguyen, Christoph Schuhmann
